resources.string: a meta do grupo recife fitness é ajudar os não praticantes de atividades fisicas,a se exercitarem.
usaremos meios de atividades basicas até o avançado, com o intuito de deixar o corpo saudavel,assim evitando enfermidades.

Many institutions have information on cash donations on their website, informing the bank, agency and deposit account. If the institution does not have a website, or bank information is not available on the institutions website, contact the institution by email silvia.vidon@imip.org.br or by phone 8121224144 and check how to make cash donations. You can make a one-time donation, or become a regular donor, by donating monthly, for example.
